results.title: [WIP] Remove CSS styling and implement built-in Astro cards
results.impact_rationale: Documentation styling improvement, minimal impact on functionality
results.urgency_rationale: WIP draft, very new (< 1 hour old), low urgency
results.quality_rationale: Draft PR with CI pending, incomplete checklist, basic description
results.action_explanation: WIP draft PR for documentation styling. Wait for author to complete checklist and mark ready for review.

results.title: Fix heredoc tests and production code to use GenerateHeredocDelimiter
results.impact_rationale: CI test failures blocking development, affects 151 workflow lock files and core delimiter generation logic
results.urgency_rationale: Fixes CI failures blocking other work (+5), affects multiple workflows, recent creation (6 hours old) (+5), important for maintaining CI health (+15)
results.quality_rationale: Good PR description with clear root cause analysis (+5), includes testing section (+3), but CI still pending (+4)
results.action_explanation: Critical CI fix affecting 30 files including test infrastructure and all workflow lock files. Well-documented with clear root cause. Needs fast-track review to unblock CI.

results.title: Add per-user per-workflow rate limiting for programmatic events
results.impact_rationale: New feature adding rate limiting capability - important security/stability feature affecting core workflow orchestration
results.urgency_rationale: 6 hours old (+3), enhances security and prevents abuse (+7), already has some triage labels (+2)
results.quality_rationale: Excellent description with clear features and implementation details (+5), includes tests (+3), comprehensive documentation (+3), CI passing evidence (+3)
results.action_explanation: Complete feature implementation with security implications. Well-documented with tests and comprehensive description. Already labeled from previous triage. Ready for review.
